name: easy-web-notes
short_description:
Easy web notes helps non web programmers author professional looking web pages the easy way. If are looking to author web pages, and not prefer blogging sites, but would like to author your own professional pages, Easy web notes helps you with it.

You might want to write an article, or a book, or just express your opinions in a few pages and publish it in the web. In order to create professional looking web pages for your personal pages, you have to learn Javascript, CSS, html, etc. To get professional results, you either have to learn good web programming, or pay to get it done. 

Easy web notes helps you here by creating a framework for writing web notes. You need to know very basic html, and all your writing goes in simple text based files ,without getting into the mess of Javascript, CSS, and advanced html concepts so that you can focus on your creative writing.
summary: Easy web notes helps author html pages for non web programmers
